Name: Metal War Online: Retribution
About the game: Join us in the free game 'Metal War Online'! We invite you to the world of uncompromising corporate wars! Unmatched dynamic shooter with a huge selection of futuristic technology! Millions of players. Only real people as enemies and friends. The action takes place in the near future. Powerful transnational corporations embroiled in a fierce battle for resources. The battlefield became the whole world. Choose any of the powerful war machines, win the battle and lead your side to victory!
